Table of Contents

Class AppReal

Namespace
BOOSEapp
Assembly
BOOSEapp.dll

Represents a real (double-precision) variable in the BOOSE language. This class preserves full floating-point precision while keeping the base BOOSE.Evaluation.Value synchronized.

public class AppReal : Evaluation, ICommand
